properties.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 29 at 3:48AM PST until February 29 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* Changes...No significant changes.

* Affected Area...Fire Zone 273 Mono and Eastern Alpine Counties
BELOW 6500 FEET.

* Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph.

* Humidity...13 to 21%.

* Duration...5 to 6 hours.

* Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can
cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first
responders can contain them.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outdoor activities that can cause a spark near dry
vegetation, such as yard work, target shooting, or campfires.
Follow local fire restrictions. Check weather.gov/reno for
updates and livingwithfire.info for preparedness tips.

NWSheadline: FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MONO AND EASTERN ALPINE COUNTIES BELOW 6500 FEET
